main event: Witnesses observed a bright shiny object resembling a star that passed by at tremendous speeds, disappeared, and reappeared.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on two different dates, 8-5-61 and 8-12-61., The object appeared to move in an arc and had the ability to suddenly speed up and change brightness., One witness estimated the speed to be three times that of a jet aircraft., The object was reported to have caused electrical disturbances in the area, affecting TV and radio., One witness claimed to have seen up to 7-8 objects in the sky.
sighted object: a bright shiny object resembling a star
witness description: retired Air Force Master Sergeant, age 76, submitted details about the sighting
